pageTitle: No. 21 Sweatshirt with Flowers & Lace | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Italian sizes. Sizes listed are Size & Fit Length: 25in / 63.5cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Made in Italy. Dry clean. 96% cotton/4% elastane. Fabric: Mid-weight fleece. Luxe, structured fleece composes this No. 21 sweatshirt, which has a refined feel with sheer lace insets and a vintage-floral front panel. Crisp poplin trims the rounded hem in front. Scoop neckline. Long raglan sleeves. Description Clothing > No. 21 > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer No. 21 is the signature project of acclaimed Italian designer Alessandro Dell'Acqua. An immediate smash hit with fashion editors and critics at its launch in 2010, the innovative line showcases Dell'Acqua's long experience as a designer of luxury knitwear and ready-to-wear. With his great technical knowledge and innate fashion sensibility, Dell'Acqua’s designs meld clean cuts with a sensual femininity for an ultimately modern look. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free. Return Details Shipping Available: Shipping Within USA Only: For Amazon Prime members, free two-day shipping is available for all Shopbop products.
